author: knoepfel
body:
This PR is to resolve issue #15594.  The changes included are:
- a new service called `StallMonitor`, which can output stream-time information to a dedicated file
- a new class called `ThreadSafeOutputFileStream`
- adjustments to the `edmStreamStallGrapher` to use the output of `StallMonitor`
title: StallMonitor service to detect thread stalls during module processing
